author: wsjcom
title: Maybe It’s Time to Reassess the Mudslinging
text:
Regarding your editorial “The Wolf Who Came as a Wolf” (April 30): I worked as a photographer for Sybil Graves, who organized support and entertainment for the White House Correspondents’ Association before 1992. She vetted the comedians’ routine to avoid a fiasco that would embarrass the attendees and the young students receiving scholarship awards from the president. In today’s climate such preparation is all the more important.
J. Murray Tarter
...
